title: Looking to buy some low-grade n172s / "Starter Lots" to begin collecting OJs
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Looking to buy some low-grade n172s / "Starter Lots" to begin collecting OJs
posts.post_content:
Hoping to buy some low grade Old Judges to get my 19th century collection going after all these years :)  Beaters are fine by me...rebacked cards are ok too!  I'm hoping to not have to spend too much per card as I'm just getting started.  

Would love it if someone could part with a group of cards, so I'd say I'd be interested in individual cards or groups!  Any player is fine!

Still got a few things to trade as well if anyone is interested in going that route --

e107s - [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=272785[/url]
m116 Proofs - [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=255222[/url]
n284 Buchner Gold Coin Ad Pieces - [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=284644[/url]
m116 short prints and rarities - [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=254859[/url]
A couple caramel miscuts / upside down backs -
[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=278655[/url]
[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=282330[/url]


Thanks in advance and looking forward to some responses!  Surely there's some ratty OJs out there you guys are itching to get rid of!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
List of tradeable cards added above....
